content.description:
Employees of the Baltimore Afro-American at the Newspaperâ€™s Headquarters in Baltimore, MD, (1935)
Photo by Afro American Newspapers/Gado/Getty Images
content.question: Which of the following developments in the African American community does the image best reflect?

choices.label: The efforts to achieve racial uplift through improved opportunities in education
The use of artistic creations by African Americans to promote cultural pride
The use of Black organizations to protest racial discrimination
The efforts of Black churches to transform Christian worship in the United States

content.answer: The use of Black organizations to protest racial discrimination

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
